report.title: Visualise records using standard filters
report.description: Report designed for visualising a flow of records, e.g. on a home page. Compatible with standard parameters and includes basic species details plus media and map data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_#precision#_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END
